summary.para: Provides specialized application information to Add/Remove Programs in Control Panel. This structure is not applicable to published applications.

remarks.para: This structure is used by the and interfaces, neither of which are applicable to published applications. Therefore, this structure is also not applicable to published applications.

summary.para: The size of the application in bytes.
The time the application was last used.
The count of times the application has been used.
A pointer to a string containing the path to the image that represents the application. The string buffer must be allocated using and freed using .
